body: David Z. Morris reported [en] that Japanese hip-hop was born in the 19th century. The blogger also suggested links to some academic articles that explain its origins and development.

title: Japan: The Pre-History of Japanese Hip Hop

sentence: David Z. Morris reported [en] that Japanese hip-hop was born in the 19th century.
The blogger also suggested links to some academic articles that explain its origins and development.
